channel.title: Diego Mellizo - Game Developer
channel.description: Recent content on Diego Mellizo - Game Developer

item.title: Code name: Vehicles
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2017 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Educational, Puzzle. Description: Game designed to reinforce auditive language development on kids, it is packed with voice recordings in several languages.

item.title: Tank Blast Arena 2D
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: 2017 - 2019 Play on simmer.io Genre: Tank shooter, 2D top-down view, death-match mode. Description: Multiplayer game supporting up to 20 concurrent users (CCU). It includes AI-driven tanks (gray color) to compensate for the absence of players.

item.title: Code name: Race
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2017 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Auto-runner. Description: Travel as many kilometers as you can before the time runs out. Collect power capsules which add time and avoid the barriers as they subtract time.

item.title: Code name: Shop
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2017 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Tower defense, similar to Plants vs. Zombies. Description: Defend your shop from some common enemies of your business, do it by placing gems on the lanes, they will summon characters with unique superpowers to help you defeat the bad guys.

item.title: Code name: Airplane
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2018 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Falling objects. Description: Fly your plane and catch the falling boxes to get points. Avoid the boxes with explosives as they will take your points away!

item.title: Code name: Bank
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2018 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Quiz, puzzle. Description: Read carefully each question, then drag your character through the bank and towards one of the possible answers at the top.

item.title: Code name: Slicer
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2018 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Arcade, similar to Fruit Ninja. Description: Slice and pop the colorful bubbles to get points. Avoid to pop the white bubbles as they will remove any bubbles currently on the screen and prevent new ones from appear for a brief moment.

item.title: Code name: Skate
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2018 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Falling objects. Description: Slide over the ramp from one side to the other while collecting as many hamburgers and drinks as you can to get points, do so before the time goes off.

item.title: Code name: Bicycle
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2018 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Platformer, auto-runner. Description: Run your bicycle through the (randomly generated) track on the beach while collecting as many soda cans and trophies as you can to get points, you can jump or double-jump to do so.

item.title: Code name: Simon Says
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2019 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Memory, similar to the electronic game Simon. Description: Pay attention to the sequences’ color and sound, then repeat them yourself.

item.title: Code name: Words
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2019 Note: the audio was removed to prevent copyright infringements. Genre: Word puzzle. Description: Read the hint at the top and complete the empty spaces in the middle by dragging letters from the grid at the bottom.

item.title: Sticky Flee
item.author: diegomellizo@outlook.com (Diego Mellizo)
item.description: In collab. with Mecca 2017 - 2019 Genre: Puzzle. Description: It is set in a laboratory where a gelatinous alien, called Sticky, is being detained, he splits into two playable characters as they try to escape using the pipelines.
